data.title: Weathersfield Elementary
data.text:
Each year, the U.S. Department of Education recognizes schools across the country that meet the qualifications for their commitment to educational excellence. The National Blue Ribbon is the highest educational award a school can receive. Weathersfield Elementary School in Conejo Valley Unified School District has been designated an Exemplary Achievement Gap Closing National Blue Ribbon School for 2020 by the U. S. Secretary. This is an INCREDIBLE honor!!!!! We are unbelievably proud to be one of the 2020 National Blue Ribbon School Award winners.

Thank you, parents, for your wonderful support and contributions. Winning this award was definitely the result of a community effort. CONGRATULATIONS to our amazing teachers, staff, and students for all your hard work and dedication to excellence.
